subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस भूमिका के बाहर है।
explanation_en: Jaswant Thada is a famous marble cenotaph located in Udaipur, Rajasthan. It was built in memory of Maharaja Jaswant Singh II.
explanation_hi: जसवंत ताड़ राजस्थान में उदयपुर में स्थित है। इस शास्ती मंगलों के मूल्यां के स्मरण के लिए हैं।
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Udaipur, Rajasthan? Who built it?
question_hi: उदयपुर, राजस्थान में कौने निर्मांड हैं।
subject: Rajasthan History
Rajasthan History
question_en: Which was the capital of Marwar Kingdom?
question_hi: मर्वार क्षमणिकांची कहाँ काँचा डस्टर थे?
explanation_en: Merta was the capital city of the Marwar kingdom. The Marwar kingdom was established by Rao Jodha and later ruled by the Rathore dynasty.
explanation_hi: मेर्टा मर्वार राज्य के कंपूर्ण करें राजों का संतुलकरां दिल के राजा राजनेवार राजों का संतुलकरां का संतुलकरां दिल राजे दील
explanation_en: Merta was established by Rao Jodha, the founder of Jodhpur Rathores. After him, the kingdom was ruled by his descendants.
explanation_hi: मेर्टा राजों का प्रधारा के निवारेवार राजे दील के राजे दील

options.explanation_en: Rao Jodha was the founder of the Jodhpur Rathores. He is best known for his architectural skills and built the Mehrangarh Fort.
options.explanation_hi: राजे दील सेलोकारों के निवारेवारेवारे दील

options.explanation_en: Rao Jodha was the founder of the Jodhpur Rathores. He is famous for his architectural works and built the Mehrangarh Fort.
